subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Reminiscent of {{cog|mnw|လ္ကံ}} (from {{cog|mkh-pro|*tkɔɔʔ}}), but probably not related ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

{{etystub|zh}}
